Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 37.8 x 13.78 x 0.39 inches; 10.4 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ G894173A
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ October 31, 2018
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Sryinx
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07LGRJFLN

Imported
Pull On closure
Machine Wash
★MULTIPLE COLORS: Our leggings have more than 20 available colors. These colors are very fashionable and beautiful and great for pairing with a variety of clothes and shoes so that you have yourself unique style of dress in each season and they are perfect for adding to your wardrobes.
★HIGH WAIST: Our leggings made from a polyester-blend fabric with a touch of spandex for easy, comfy wear. Cut in a high-rise silhouette with a slim fit and finished with a full elastic wide waistband, tummy control wide waistband contours your curves and streamlines your shape.
★SOFT FABRIC: You will love our leggings once you put them on and experience a combination of softness and stretchiness. They are made from 92% polyester and 8% Spandex to give you freedom of movement no matter what you’re doing. These super soft leggings will gently caress your lower half like a second skin. “Small/Medium = One Size US 2-12”, “Large/X-Large = Plus Size US 12-24” or “XX-Large = Extra Size US 24-32 “, which are designed to figure flattering and supportive for all sizes.

  5. SAY HI TO A BETTER YOU

    Designed and Tested by Women Like You, for you

  6. How we got our start?

    Founded in 2016, we wanted to spread good by bringing the best leggings to the world,to the celebrities and the fashion-forward who wear because it’s the perfect street brand, comfortable, contemporary and decidedly not just for the mat.

    What makes our product unique?

    Buttery soft athleisure that your body loves, empowering you to feel good in your skin.

    Why we love what we do?

    Our vision is to be the world’s most fashionable, innovative, and inclusive active-lifestyle brand. At Syrinx, we believe everyone deserves to lok and feel their best.

Designed with ribbed,close and contouring fit, which not only effectively protect against shock, ensures a tight fit, but also beautify the torso curve, increase the fashion sexy style.

Sexy butt lift women’s yoga leggings can be a perfect companion with different style outfits. This sports bra active leggings set definitely make you looks sexy, stylish and fashionable during your gym.

OQQ yoga set can be used in the gym Pilates studio, outdoor sports and daily leisure places.

Great Valentine’s birthday Christmas thanksgiving gift idea for women,mother,seniors,teen girls,friends.

[Main Fabric] – This 3 piece yoga outfits cut from lightweight, sweatproof baby ribbed fabric that doesn’t compromise on comfort, is also seamless ensuring a smooth overall finish. High elasticity, Comfortable, Breathable,Dry,The 4-way stretch to promote both compression and butt lifting, upper leg muscles and reduce muscle vibrations are designed to flatter your silhouette whilst providing a supportive fit.
[Super Flattering] – Seamless knit fabric, teamed with a stay-put high waistband tummy control,contours your curves and shape your body.Ribbed textured non-slip design that can keep it in place when you walk around.designed for both strength and style.

item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) HeatGear® Armour is our original performance baselayer—the one you put on first and take off last. So we made it extra comfortable by wicking sweat and stretching so you can move no matter what. Super-light HeatGear® fabric delivers superior coverage without weighing you down. Strategic mesh panels for added ventilation ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $23.98
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:28:28 UTC – Details)


HeatGear® Armour is our original performance baselayer—the one you put on first and take off last. So we made it extra comfortable by wicking sweat and stretching so you can move no matter what. Super-light HeatGear® fabric delivers superior coverage without weighing you down. Strategic mesh panels for added ventilation where you need it. Material wicks sweat & dries really fast. Ergonomic design keeps seams off high abrasion areas & increases durability. Wide, exposed elastic waistband with wordmark detail. Updated gusset design provides ultimate support & comfort. Drop-in Strength Pocket on right side for easy storage. Inseam: 28″”. No fly. Compression: Ultra-tight, second-skin fit. 84% Polyester/16% Elastane.
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 10.83 x 7.8 x 1.69 inches; 4.76 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 1361586
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ October 15, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Under Armour
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09JL2DXQ8

Pull On closure
Machine Wash

item.content:encoded:

(as of Nov 29,2022 01:56:00 UTC – Details)


Featuring the same great fit as our cotton spandex jersey legging, this nylon tricot version is perfect for the gym or for adding a fun accent to any outfit. A unique range of colors to suit a wide variety of needs.

Con el mismo gran ajuste que nuestros leggings de punto de algodón y elastano, esta versión de punto de nailon es perfecta para el gimnasio o para añadir un toque divertido a cualquier atuendo. Una gama única de colores para adaptarse a una amplia variedad de necesidades.

עם אותה התאמה נהדרת כמו מכנסי הטייץ מכותנת ספנדקס שלנו, גרסת הטי-שירט הזו מניילון מושלמת לחדר הכושר או להוספת הדגשה מהנה לכל תלבושת. מגוון צבעים ייחודי כדי להתאים למגוון רחב של צרכים.

يتميز بنفس المقاس الرائع مثل السراويل الضيقة المصنوعة من القطن والسباندكس المصنوع من قماش الجورسيه، هذا الإصدار المصنوع من النايلون مثالي لصالة الألعاب الرياضية أو لإضافة لمسة ممتعة إلى أي ملابس. مجموعة فريدة من الألوان لتناسب مجموعة متنوعة من الاحتياجات.

면 스판덱스 저지 레깅스와 동일한 훌륭한 핏을 자랑하는 이 나일론 트리코 버전은 체육관 의상 또는 모든 의상에 재미있는 액센트를 추가하고 싶을 때 착용할 수 있습니다. 다양한 요구에 맞는 독특한 색상 범위.
